Hero.shareButtonLinkText: I've just signed the #BitcoinManifest! Are you a Bitcoin Supporter? Did you get your invite already?

Manifest.title: We are
Manifest.body:
Who promote hard money based in code, math and energy;
Who defend the right of privacy, anonymity and freedom;
Who empower through decentralized property and financial inclusion;
WE ARE THE BITCOIN SUPPORTERS.

LargestB.body: In 2023, in times of active attacks to bitcoin‚Äôs freedom through travel rules, KYCs and the spring of CBDCs, the Argentinean Bitcoin NGO gathered over 500 Bitcoin enthusiasts to create the first ever and ‚ÄúWorld¬¥s Biggest Bitcoin Logo‚Äù in defense and as a shout out of the Bitcoin Revolution and the pillars of it‚Äôs monetary freedom with hundreds of orange umbrellas forming a 40 meters tall Bitcoin Logo.
